titleStmt.title: Resolvtions and decisions of divers practicall cases of conscience in continuall use amongst men very necessary for their information and direction in these evil times, in four decades / by Jos. Hall ...
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with some additionalls.

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to be sold by R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"An advertisement to the reader": p. [2]-[6] at end.
Attributed to Joseph Hall. cf. BM.
